options.text: Worm: You survived The Tide... the first great trial of our village. Hope returns because of you.

You fought with a strength that shines brighter than our legends. On behalf of every worm who still draws breathâ€¦ thank you.

But your mission is not over. Other villages still tremble beneath the shadow of the <color=#AE49FF>Demon Kingdom</color>.

Step through the <color=#AE49FF>portal</color>, brave one. Continue your path toward becoming the <color=#AE49FF>hero</color> our world desperately needs.
